alert.note: Alert for Milam; Robertson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 6:56PM CDT until April 20 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR ROBERTSON AND NORTHEASTERN MILAM COUNTIES... At 655 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located from Bremond to Hearne, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cameron, Hearne, Franklin, Calvert, Bremond, Twin Oak Reservoir, Camp Creek Lake, Lake Limestone, Crossroads, Silver City, Jones Prairie, Ben Arnold, Baileyville, Maysfield, Seale, Easterly, New Baden, Bald Prairie, Wheelock and Burlington. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
